Name: Chippy
About the game: Chippy is a twin-stick bullet-hell shooter with destructible bosses. Chip them apart pixel-by-pixel, slice off sections, and attack their cores as fast as you can. FEATURES Dodge, shoot, and destroy 14 challenging multi-form bosses A variety of powerups - choose offensive or defensive based on your skill level Simple scoring system - fastest time wins Leaderboards and replays for each boss fight Steam Workshop support NEW : Local co-op supported for every boss NEW : Easy and Nightmare versions of each campaign
Meta Title: Chippy: Jun 14, 2019, Facepunch Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Chippy? Check out the release date (Jun 14, 2019), developer insights from Facepunch Studios, and a complete game summary.
